name: Vitriolic Mist
components: V, S, M (a piece of lemon rind)
text: This functions as fire shield, except it wreathes you in yellow or green acidic mist instead of hot or cold flames. The spell deals acid damage to attackers and protects you against acid damage. This spell does not shed light.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一片柠檬皮)
text_zh:
这个法术工作方式类似火焰护盾 (fire shield)，不过围绕你的会是一层黄色或绿色的硫酸云雾而不是冷或热的火焰。

本法术造成酸液伤害并且从酸液攻击中保护你。本法术不会发出任何光亮。
